abstract.t: Using Unicode codepoints in protocol strings requires preparation ofthe string. Internationalized Domain Names(idn) initial work definedand used Stringprep and Nameprep. Other protocols have definedStringprep profiles. New approach different from Stringprep/Nameprepis used for a revision of IDN. This document summarize thecharacteristics of both approach and provides guidance to protocoldesigners for handling internationalized strings.
